Module java.desktop
Package javax.swing.plaf.basic

Class DefaultMenuLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.BoxLayout
      • javax.swing.plaf.basic.DefaultMenuLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, LayoutManager2, Serializable, UIResource
    public class DefaultMenuLayout
extends BoxLayout
implements UIResource
    The default layout manager for Popup menus and menubars. This class is an extension of BoxLayout which adds the UIResource tag so that pluggable L&Fs can distinguish it from user-installed layout managers on menus.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields declared in class javax.swing.BoxLayout

        LINE_AXIS, PAGE_AXIS, X_AXIS, Y_AXIS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DefaultMenuLayout​(Container target, int axis)
      Constructs a new instance of DefaultMenuLayout.

      • Methods declared in class javax.swing.BoxLayout

        addLayoutComponent, addLayoutComponent, getAxis, getLayoutAlignmentX, getLayoutAlignmentY, getTarget, invalidateLayout, layoutContainer, maximumLayoutSize, minimumLayoutSize, preferredLayoutSize, removeLayoutComponent

      • Methods declared in class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultMenuLayout

        public DefaultMenuLayout​(Container target,
                         int axis)
        Constructs a new instance of DefaultMenuLayout.
        Parameters:
        target - the container that needs to be laid out
        axis - the axis to lay out components along. Can be one of: BoxLayout.X_AXIS, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS, BoxLayout.LINE_AXIS or BoxLayout.PAGE_AXIS
